title: David Carr on his brother's win in London & did the Chiefs get exposed?
itunes:title: David Carr on his brother's win in London & did the Chiefs get exposed?
description:
Dave Dameshek is joined in Studio 66 by our pal David Carr! The Daves get into Derek Carr's performance and big win vs Chicago while playing in London (2:20). Next, after the Chiefs loss to the Colts, the duo discusses how Mahomes and company could falter in the future (12:05). Then, Shek complains how much of a struggle it has been to watch the Steelers this season especially now with a third string QB (21:30). Lastly, we round out the show with the Bon & Viv Food Block segment (43:05).

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
